data.title: old French diplomat and lyric poet Alexis Leger (ALEXIA LEGER) who is known under the name Saint
data.meta_description: Download this stock image: Oct. 27, 1960 - Literature Nobel-Prize for Saint-John Perse: The Nobel-Prize for Literature was this years awarded to 73-year-old French diplomat and lyric poet Alexis Leger (ALEXIA LEGER) who is known under the name Saint-John Perse (SAINT JOHN PERSE) as pot. Since 1940, he lives in Washington. - E0W0NM from Alamy's library of millions of high resolution stock photos, illustrations and vectors.
